titleStmt.title: The history of the Chaldaick philosophy by Thomas Stanley.
titleStmt.author: Stanley, Thomas, 1625-1678.
Stanley, Thomas, 1625-1678. Chaldaick oracles of Zoroaster.

notesStmt.note: Includes: The Chaldaick oracles of Zoroaster and his followers, with the expositions of Pletho and Psellus. London : Printed for Thomas Dring, 1661 (poems in Greek, with Latin and English translations collected and translated by F. Patrizi).
Item at reel 195:1b bound with The history of philosophy / by Thomas Stanley.
Reproductions of originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
